name: Tsushima
summary: At the end of May in 1905, after sailing halfway around the world, the Russian Baltic Fleet arrived in the Straits of Tsushima to do battle with the Japanese Imperial Navy. This battle would decide the outcome of the Russo-Japanese War at sea. The clash of Admiral Togo's fleet with that of Admiral Rozhestvensky's would be one of the most decisive naval battles in history.
info:
• 开发: HPS Simulations
  • 游戏类型: Strategy
  • 售价: $49.95
